snippet: Two firefighters who fell through a collapsing floor were among at least nine injured as they fought a fire that spread swiftly among four buildings.
abstract: Two firefighters who fell through a collapsing floor are among at least nine injured as they fought a fire in the east Bronx that spread swiftly among four buildings.

byline.original: By PATRICK McGEEHAN and IVAN PEREIRA

lead_paragraph: Two firefighters who fell through a collapsing floor were among at least nine injured as they fought a fire that spread swiftly among four buildings.

headline.seo: Blaze Spreads on a Windy Day in the Bronx, Injuring 9 Firefighters
headline.main: Blaze Spreads on a Windy Day in the Bronx, Injuring 9 Firefighters
headline.print_headline: Blaze Spreads on a Windy Day in the Bronx, Injuring 9 Firefighters
